richard_pollock.focus: Fast On-Site Health Checks (Prevention, Vitamin D)
richard_pollock.text: Carrying out analysis of Vitamin D levels and other key health indicators on-site cannot be underestimated. The Igloo Pro enables me to perform a simple capillary blood test, to ascertain patients’ needs and to then guide them as to which additional supplements they might require to optimise treatment. This capability is proving transformative in terms of patient outcomes.

martin_fischer.title: Specialist in Internal Medicine / Internal Medicine Practice Dr. Fischer

martin_fischer.text: The ability to determine inflammation markers like CRP immediately in the practice has revolutionized our treatment workflow. We can decide faster whether antibiotic therapy is necessary for patients with unclear infections and prevent unnecessary referrals. This saves us time and significantly increases patient satisfaction.

goran_stojanovic.title: Biological Dentist / Principal Dentist & Owner
goran_stojanovic.focus: Rapid chairside diagnostics for implant planning (Vitamin D, CRP)
goran_stojanovic.text: As a biological dentist, I am deeply convinced that holistic health always begins with the teeth. The Igloo Pro allows me to make fast and precise diagnostic decisions exactly where they are needed: at the chair. With immediate Vitamin D and CRP analysis, I can plan implant placements optimally and often accelerate them significantly. This gives my patients safer and more efficient treatment.

faq.caption: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About PolarisDX and Point-of-Care Diagnostics

items.question: What does PolarisDX do?
items.answer: PolarisDX is your partner for point-of-care diagnostics in Europe. We don't just supply devices and rapid tests — we support you from initial consultation through commissioning to ongoing operations. Our goal: lab-grade diagnostics directly in your practice, without the detour via a central laboratory.

items.question: Which sectors benefit from point-of-care diagnostics?
items.answer: Our solutions are used wherever fast, precise lab results are needed on site. Our core areas are dental, longevity and beauty — but we also support GPs, internists and other specialities where POCT adds value.

items.question: How does a partnership with PolarisDX work?
items.answer: After a personal consultation, we assemble your individual setup. You receive your device within 3–5 business days, including validated commissioning. After that, we support you with training, technical assistance and ongoing care.

items.question: What products and solutions does PolarisDX offer?
items.answer: Our current portfolio includes the IglooPro POC reader, a broad range of rapid tests for biomarkers such as Vitamin D3, CRP and HbA1c, plus complementary products like our Vitamin D3 spray. We continuously expand our offering to provide you with a comprehensive diagnostic solution.
